about.title: About Bozorgi Group
about.description: Since 1988, Bozorgi Group has operated under the motto "Business Without Boundaries." We are a premier trading house specializing in the global import, export, and strategic distribution of high-quality building materials.
about.missionText: To supply superior building materials with unmatched service and competitive pricing, expanding our global footprint through advanced international management systems.
about.visionText: To lead the global building materials market by upholding our core values of honesty, transparency, and operational excellence on every front.
about.valuesText: Honesty, loyalty, clarity, and continuous learning. We prioritize humanity and mutual benefit, fostering transparent relationships with all our partners.

theme.title: Theme
whyus.title: Why Choose Bozorgi Group — Wood Consulting Experts
whyus.subtitle: In the world of wood, experience matters most — and we’ve built ours through years of real, hands-on work in global markets.
whyus.desc1: Bozorgi Group is a specialized wood consulting and sourcing firm, offering deep expertise in wood and wood-based materials — from sourcing and importing to selecting the right materials for industrial and architectural projects.
whyus.desc2: Our consulting services are grounded in market reality and proven field experience — not theory.
whyus.list1: Choose the right type of wood based on your needs, budget, and purpose.
whyus.list2: Avoid costly mistakes in purchasing or project execution.
whyus.list3: Gain access to trusted global suppliers and high-quality raw materials.
whyus.list4: Make confident technical and business decisions with professional guidance.
whyus.conclusion: With long-term experience across Spain, the Middle East, and Europe, we bring a broad vision and solid network to every project. At Bozorgi Group, we are not just suppliers — we are your trusted wood consultants and strategic partners in every step of the decision-making process.
